document_data.name: Queens' Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Queens' Dynasty''', also known as the '''Queens' Era''', was a period of [[Tethyr]]'s history defined by its ruling queens of the [[House of Ithal-Strohm-Bormul]].
document_data.History: The era began with King [[Strohm V]]'s daughter, Queen [[Alisande Bormul|Alisande]] of the [[Bormul]]s. She was followed by three more queens renowned for their wisdom and diplomacy, who were remembered for centuries to come by their fair laws and governance. The peace and prosperity was ended suddenly when their cousin [[Mhoaran]] slew King [[Teremir Bormul I|Teremir I]] and siezed the throne for himself, leading to the assent of the fractious [[Lions' Dynasty]].
